entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
